documents.document:
A most difficult discipline karen millen in the Senate and N

If the PS and karen millen outletthe chief executives welcome to have a majority in the Senate and National Assembly, accompanied by an absolute majority in the latter, the installation has not been smooth. And some friction.

The appointment of the first government of Jean-Marc Ayrault had already caused some heartburn,http://www.karenmillen-malluk.comespecially among socialist senators. Francois Hollande not count on a lot of followers, who have actively contributed to the preparation of his campaign, the organization of its networks and its rise to power. They have also enabled her to win the primary in his camp and karen millenthen to carry it to victory in the presidential election.

His fellow senators felt somewhat "forgotten". Nicole Bricq only appeared in the first government. In the balance last minute, several "potential ministers" out of the pond of the Luxembourg Palace were sacrificed. Starting with the group's boss, François Rebsamen,karen millen dressesforced to grin and cons heart. Or others, such as Didier Guillaume, Thierry André Vallini or Repentin.

SERIES jolts

At the first meeting of the Socialist Group in the Senate held between the presidential and legislative elections, in the presence of Prime Minister Jean-Marc Ayrault, Alain Vidal, karen millen the minister responsible for relations with Parliament, and Jean Bel-Pierre, President of the Senate, several elected officials have sent the message. The second government Ayrault then saw the arrival of three new ministers from the Senate.

The installation of the new National Assembly was accompanied by a series of jolts. The election of the PS candidate for the presidency of the Palais Bourbon revealed some enemies, including Segolene Royal - if she had been barred by his constituents - would certainly have paid the price. More surprising still, the head of government is not able to convince his Minister Marylise Lebranchu be a candidate, she was so unsure that the operation was successful. Claude Bartolone has cleverly his own way.

The new leader of the socialist deputies, Bruno Le Roux, karen millen outlet will have to manage both a group and deeply renewed relations with partners, already, are showing signs of a bad mood. The rebuff he was sentenced by his troops on the award of a standing committee chair to ecologists shows that the group is not "orders". Although no one challenged him on his election as head of the group, he will have some time to reach its mark.

MAJORITY DISPERSED IN FOUR GROUPS

Especially since the pressure will not fail. And that the dispersion of the majority in four groups will not make things easier. The PS would have gladly excused from having to contend with the radical left, a fourth thief. He could not avoid it. Empowering MPs PRG is not in itself good news for him.

With environmentalists and the Left Front, the distribution of posts of responsibility resulted from the outset to some tensions. Unhappy to see them escape the presidency of the Committee on Sustainable Development, the first refused, Tuesday, June 26, Claude Bartolone vote for the presidency of the Assembly. Warning toll.

The next day, karen millen dresses the president of the Democratic and Republican Left group, Chassaigne Andre, who found "particularly objectionable" the refusal of the PS group to assign to his vice-presidency or a committee chairmanships. "This decision reflects a political stance that will not, tomorrow, a real change, says Mr. Chassaigne. If these guidelines are confirmed, I doubt that we can express a favorable vote" to the question of confidence that will pose the first Minister, Tuesday, July 3, after his policy statement.

UMP: Wauquiez formalizes support karen millen outlet for Fra

And two. After Valérie Pécresse,karen millen dressesformer budget minister, it was the turn of Wauquiez, former minister of research, to provide support to François Fillon against Jean-Francois Cope in the battle for the presidency of the UMP to be held at a conference in late November.

In an interview with Le Figaro, he says: "Regain not going to be easy,karen millen outletand you can not do as if we would continue as before at the head of the UMP. If you want to be up to the issues expect our political family, we must come together, and Francois Fillon is undoubtedly the best position to do so. " He even calls to declare before the end of summer. Fillonistes strategy is clear:http://www.karenmillen-malluk.comspeed up the timetable for imposing the candidacy of former prime minister in the minds and to move the divider to Mr. Cope.

Facilitator of the social right,karen millenthe five years past Fillon at Matignon "he forged an undeniable stature as a statesman. It has a very strong popularity, and we really need to regain positions. It is also one who can make a synthesis between the approaches of our political family: it combines the strength of the republican sovereign subjects, karen millen outlet a pragmatic view of Europe and last but not the courage to speak truth to French including on public finances ".

"THE TIME IS NOT THE LONELY TRAIL TOURS"

Wauquiez goes further than just support by encouraging Mr. Cope to step aside to make way for former Prime Minister: "In the last period before us, we can not afford the luxury of fighting sterile. (...) I am convinced karen millen that Jean-Francois Cope has at heart to put the best interests of our political family first ".

Mr. Wauquiez is considered as a long-standing support of the new deputy of Paris. He specifically made several criticisms of the way the member and mayor of Meaux manages the party with the methods he considers "clan". He had, during the campaign shied away himself a candidate. A hypothesis that farm today. "I could shake me too my candidacy, he says, but I think the time is not the solitary laps. My obsession is that wars do not break our egos political family. Everyone must make an effort in putting aside his own ambitions. "

He still intends to make karen millen dresses its voice heard as the voice of a "new generation of elected officials." It also has a motion in Congress on behalf of the social right to wear his favorite themes, the struggle against the assistantship and the defense of the middle classes.

Serbie: karen millen outlet the Socialist Prime Minister Ivi

http://www.karenmillen-malluk.comThe nationalist president of Serbia, Tomislav Nikolic, announced Thursday, June 28 have mandated the Socialist leader Ivica Dacic to form a new government in alliance with the Party of Serbian progress (SNS). "The coalition gathered around the Socialist Party (SPS) Ivica Dacic has convinced me that it had secured a working majority" in Parliament to form the government,karen millentold the press Nikolic. "These are serious people. The coalition has convinced me that it controls a majority" in Parliament, which has 250 seats, as required by the Constitution, so that the President can appoint his prime minister, he said.

He said the new coalition would be formed around the SNS,karen millen dressesthe Socialists and their ally post-election the Party of Regions of the United Serbia (URS). Such a coalition would have a majority of 131 seats in Parliament after the general elections of May 6 The prime minister-designate until September 5 to present his cabinet to the investiture vote of the Assembly.

Dacic succeeds where a tour de force came only third of the legislative,karen millen outletthe former associate of Slobodan Milosevic was able to make essential, as in the opinion that in the negotiations between the political forces in Belgrade.

The appointment of Mr Dacic as prime minister came karen millen outlet after the breakdown of negotiations between him and his former ally in the outgoing government, the Democratic Party (DS) of the former pro-European President Boris Tadic.

Wednesday, he had already hinted, with his usual straightforwardness, the nationalists offered him the post of prime minister, while the pro-Europeans do it proposed that ministerial positions, as was the case in government out. "The key question is why being part of a government when we can manage" another, 'he said.

The formation of a coalition involving karen millen the socialist and the nationalist SNS eventually marginalize the pro-European democrats. Defeated in the second round of the presidential election on May 20, Boris Tadic expected to be able to retain the government. Its formation is found ousted from all levers of power.

The alliance between the old ultranationalist Nikolic and a former close ally of Mr. Milosevic also feeds doubts about the willingness of Europeans to Belgrade to pursue rapprochement with the Union.

While President multiplied clumsy statements towards its neighbors, karen millen dresses the rapprochement between Belgrade and Moscow has intensified. In his first statement to the press, Mr. Dacic immediately sought to reassure its partners. "This government is neither pro-European or pro-Russian nor pro-Chinese or pro-American. I am interested only in a pro-Serb government that will work in the interest of the citizens of Serbia", he stressed.

Mali: karen millen outlet the ghosts of the Sahel

http://www.karenmillen-malluk.comNorth - northeast, Mali, at high speed on the slopes of laterite and sand. We are in the northern region of the former French Sudan, unilaterally proclaimed state since April 6 by the National Movement for the Liberation of Azawad (MNLA), after a lightning military offensive on the main cities: Agueloc, Tessalit, Kidal, Gao and Timbuktu.

Since Mali's independence in 1960,karen millenthree rebellions called "Tuareg" have marked the history of this part of the country, twice as large as France. Today the situation is complex and chaotic: Tuareg separatists, Islamists, jihadists, "traffickers" of Western hostages ... Not to mention a transitional authority in Bamako after the military coup of 22 March, an Algeria, indispensable regional power,karen millen outlethad little to say, a Burkina Faso active diplomatically.

It is very unstable in this context that Olivier Laurent Hamida Joulie and left in May to Gao and thence to the Algerian border, to meet the MNLA. Who are these fighters? What are their relationships with katibas (brigades) karen millen dressesof Al-Qaeda in Islamic Maghreb (AQIM).

DISCONTINUED VALLEYS, deserted villages

Go to Gao, karen millen outlet the largest city in North is located on the left bank of the River Niger and new "capital of Azawad", where we met Colonel Mehdi Hassan, a former officer of the Malian army has chosen to join the MNLA at the end of 2011. This is to control the main roads to prevent weapons from Libya arrived in town.

"There are strong fears that arms fall, especially in the Niger border. We have quite a few problems with militias, armed groups who have always created a psychosis. Today we are trying to stop that" , said the military career.

In the center of the city, karen millen the security situation seems much more fluid: we came across the 4 × 4 black flag emblazoned with the Ansar Eddine, Tuareg Islamist movement, and vehicles belonging to AQIM. Turning behind tinted windows ...

Algerian border management: abandoned valleys, deserted villages. As that of Ali, the fighter MNLA, started more than twenty years in the various rebellions. He lost forty-seven members of his family, killed by the Malian army in the 1990s. Since then, a life of wandering and fighting. At the gates of Algeria, near Tin Zaouaten, strange situation: the Malian side, a refugee camp in very basic, the Algerian side, karen millen dresses a small town Saharan equipped with the essentials. In the sky, passages of Sukhoi and helicopter Algerian army ...

Ancestral lands Tuareg, now become as jihadist strongholds, and Lawrence Olivier Joulie Hamidou show us the return of some ghosts: rebellions, acts of violence, refugees, poverty. A gray area so close to Europe. Rare footage and poignant.

Paraguay: karen millen Coup 2.0

On June 22, President of Paraguay karen millen dresseshas been removed by the senate of his country after an express procedure, and at nine months of the next presidential elections. If the forms contained in the constitution appear to be followed, the reasons, exaggerated in the eyes of all observers, and haste in its execution, the president will have had less than two hours to defend themselves, make this new episode in the life Paraguayan political genuine constitutional coup.karen millenTerrible step backwards for a region believed to have exorcised the demons undemocratic characterized until recently by the litany of military coups.

Brought to power in 2008 by a coalition of parties and social movements from left, former bishop Fernando Lugo had first made the mistake at the polls to defeat the Colorado party, survival of the dictatorship of Alfredo Stroesner,http://www.karenmillen-malluk.comwho had monopolized power for 61 years, blithely confuse the party coffers and those of the state and by patronage and corruption rules of conduct.

The task was huge for the new president, whose stated priorities were social, especially with the implementation of agrarian reform to correct a distribution of the earth the most unequal in the world: 350 000 families n 'not have them, while several individuals from the previous regime are at the head of hundreds of thousands of hectares.karen millen outletIn so doing, he touched the interests of large landowners, not to mention the mafias that control the drug trade, often with protection in high places, whole territories in the north.

But the new president karen millen did not count on a majority in parliament to support his proposed reforms. Bills remained iconic and blocked for four years, foremost among them the tax reform. The tax burden remains the lowest in the hemisphere, there is no tax on personal income, and the agro-exporter, accounting for 30% of GDP, contributing 0.3% of tax revenue! Despite these difficulties, it can claim a substantial adjustment in the culture of corruption of public institutions, a marked expansion of social programs and the introduction of free universal health care, and a change clear perception of the image of Paraguay in the world. Witness, the acceptance in 2009 by Brazil of the renegotiation of the Treaty of Itaipu hydroelectric dam, which led to a doubling of royalties received by the country, an increase of nearly 3% of GDP.

The reaction of Latin American countries, karen millen dresses meeting within the Union of South American Nations (UNASUR) and the Organization of American States (OAS), is clear in this regard. They denounced the failure of the democratic order summarily draped constitutional legitimacy and refuse to recognize the government formed by the former vice president, including cables filtered by Wikileaks show that this cherished goal since 2009. Mercosur, comprising Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay, has already suspended the participation of Paraguay, who was chairman pro tempore of the trade bloc, of any decision process, and several countries (Argentina, Ecuador, Venezuela, Uruguay, Chile, Colombia and Brazil) have withdrawn or recalled their ambassadors for consultations in Paraguay.

It is important that France and the European Union, support the democratic process and Paraguay do not rush to recognize an illegitimate government, as some countries have already done unfortunately. The position of President of Uruguay, Jose Mujica, seems a reasonable course of action. Aware of the difficulty in restoring the presidency of Fernando Lugo in the current domestic political context, he asks the rapid achievement of new elections to form a legitimate government, karen millen outlet as the team claims to hold in place until the end of term Lugo in August 2013. This position is likely to be one on which countries will converge in the region. France must firmly support the process of representative political bodies in Latin America face of what constitutes a fatal step backwards in the history of this continent and a new punishment for a people too long a victim of the rapacity of a political class of another age.

The Mercosur suspends Paraguay and karen millen outlet Venez

Mercosur Southern Cone Common Market America,karen millen outletmet Friday, June 29 summit in Argentina, decided to suspend the Paraguay after the impeachment of President Fernando Lugo, and integrate Venezuela, said Argentine President, Cristina Kirchner.

"On July 31,http://www.karenmillen-malluk.comVenezuela will be integrated as a full member of Mercosur," she said after the summit, attended by the presidents of Brazil, Dilma Rousseff, and Uruguay, José Mujica. Venezuela's accession was previously blocked by the Paraguayan Parliament.
Accused by Parliament to have "exercised its functions poorly," Mr. Lugo (left) was ousted last Friday after a political trial shipped within a few hours before Congress,karen millen dressesand was succeeded by his vice- President, Liberal Federico Franco. The next elections are due in April 2013.

RESIGNATION OF THE HIGH REPRESENTATIVE OF MERCOSUR

Meanwhile,karen millenthe High Representative of Mercosur, the Brazilian Samuel Pinheiro Guimaraes, karen millen outlet gave up his duties believing that his work was only possible with "the strong political support" of member countries.

The Brazilian diplomat took office in January 2011 (the position was created in December 2010). His mission was political articulation, karen millen formulation of joint proposals and representation of member countries of Mercosur, founded in 1991.

In a report Thursday, he stressed the imbalances within the bloc - which includes two giants and two small countries - karen millen dresses and nécesssité improve political coordination between them. He also said that South American integration should go through the "gradual expansion" of Mercosur. He suggested the gradual integration of Ecuador, Bolivia, Suriname and Guyana.

Olivier Ferrand, karen millen outlet president of Think Tank

Olivier Ferrand,karen millenpresident of the think tank Terra Nova, which had just been elected the eighth Party deputy district of Bouches-du-Rhone, died Saturday morning at Velaux (Bouches-du-Rhone) of cardiac arrest to 42 years, announces the first secretary of the PS 13, Jean-David Ciot. "He left this morning for a run and went into cardiac arrest at home.http://www.karenmillen-malluk.comFirefighters were unable to revive him," said Mr. Ciot, evoking a "huge shock". Married with a daughter of 12 years, Mr. Ferrand was "a young hope of the PS, a party of forty-somethings who had just been elected," he added.

According to his deputy Jean-Pierre Maggi,karen millen dressesthe member has "died in his family home" Velaux, around 10:30 am, "he fell in his garden, it was his mother who discovered it," he said . "He had campaigned long and hard,karen millen outletit occurred everywhere in the media or elsewhere: it is the fatigue?", Asked his deputy, that he knew of no history of heart problems. Maggi, who had an appointment with him at 11 o'clock, spoke of a "shock to everyone": "it represented the future," he said.

"Today, karen millen outlet the National Assembly mourns and mourns the loss of a young MP appreciated both for his great human qualities and his remarkable intelligence," he said in a statement Claude Bartolone, new president of the National Assembly. The Minister of Economy and Finance, Pierre Moscovici, also expressed "shocked" by his death. "He was a young, inventive, who has created, with Terra Nova, a foundation that has found its place," he said on RTL. "He had just been elected, he had accomplished this dream in the Bouches-du-Rhone, his department, (...) think that the session will begin with the policy speech of the Prime Minister on Tuesday and that he will not be there, it's very hard, "he added. The former Minister for Housing UMP, Benoist Found, who had discussed with him Friday on LCI, said on Twitter that his death was "a very great loss to the public debate".

"I have learned with great emotion and great sadness the sudden death of Olivier Ferrand. It's a huge shock to me, for the Socialists, karen millen as for all those who were lucky enough to work with him", wrote the first secretary Socialist Party Martine Aubry. "Today France has lost a man who embodied beautifully generation change arrival at the Palais Bourbon. It loses a man for whom public engagement was not separable from the debate of ideas. Intellectual passion, he was one of the figures the younger generation who moved his political ideas with passion and innovation at the head of the founding Terra Nova ", the first secretary added that address" all his thoughts "to the woman and the daughter of Olivier Ferrand and any his family.

A graduate of Sciences Po, HEC and ENA began his career at the Treasury Department. This "convinced European," according to Pierre Moscovici, was, among others, technical adviser for European Affairs of the Prime Minister, Lionel Jospin, Pierre Moscovici advisor when he was the representative of France to the Convention on the Future of Europe, and member of the Group of Policy Advisers pésident the European Commission, Romano Prodi.

It was created in 2008 Terra Nova, karen millen dresses a think tank close to the PS that aggregates one thousand experts and produced thirty trials. Mr. Ferrand was also a sportsman who practiced skiing and tennis, and had recently put in the marathon.

In the second round of legislative June 17, he had obtained during a triangular, 40.48% of the vote against the UMP candidate Nicolas Isnard (39.91%) and the FN Gerald Gerin (19, 61%). His deputy, Jean-Pierre Maggi, will take his place in the Chamber.

Martine Aubry considers himself a victim of karen millen out

http://www.karenmillen-malluk.comProsecutors in Lille has opened a preliminary investigation after being captured by Martine Aubry, who believes they have been under pressure from the Siemens Group in the awarding of a contract for the subway of Lille,karen millen outletsaid on Saturday 30 June from sources.

The urban community of Lille, which the mayor of Lille is the president, was awarded on May 11 a contract to build the new Metro trains, estimated at 266.4 million euros, the French group Alstom,karen millencompete with the Germany's Siemens and Canada's Bombardier.

"The day before the meeting of the Committee tender to award the contract, we received a letter as an e-mail the Vice President of Siemens, complaining of their ranking," said Eric Quiquet,karen millen dressesSenior Vice President of Lille Metropole in charge of transport. "We made the decision to transmit this information to the prosecutor," he added.

"To make matters worse, the same evening, Martine Aubry inaugurated a cultural event in Lille and the head of Siemens France, who was there, karen millen outlet asked to see the folder that was going to spend the day in committee," continued Mr. Quiquet , citing "startling practices".

"AT HOME, SUCH PRACTICE DOES NOT TAKEN"

"Martine Aubry has spoken publicly about the pressures (...) Friday, during a council of the urban community (...) to send a message" and tell businesses that could respond to calls for tender that "at home, karen millen this type of practice has no control," Mr. Quiquet.

"The mayor (Lille, Martine Aubry) I was informed of the facts which seem abnormal, so I ordered a preliminary investigation, carried out by the police," confirmed the prosecutor in Lille Frederick Smith. "If these facts are proven, they are legally qualify," said the prosecutor, having been seized by specifying Aubry "just before the appointment of the contractor."

Siemens had filed an urgent application against the pre-contractual award of this contract to Alstom. According to Eric Quiquet, "karen millen dresses it was released on June 21" by the Administrative Court of Lille. Contacted by AFP, the management of Siemens was not immediately available.

The Japan restarts a nuclear karen millen reactor in Kansai

Japanese power company Kansai Electric Power karen millen dressesreactivated Sunday night the reactor number 3 of its central Ohio. Despite a very public split and recurring events, Kansai Electric Power has restarted the reactor to 21 hours local (14 hours in Paris), according to several Japanese media.karen millen outletThe chain reaction should be confirmed Monday morning and start generating electricity Wednesday 4.

The company received approval on June 16 local authorities and http://www.karenmillen-malluk.comthe Prime Minister to return to service of Units 3 and 4 Ohi (or Oi). She immediately started preparations.

The Town of Ohio, Fukui Prefecture and the government felt that these reactors could be put into safe operation on the basis of stress tests validated by the supervisory bodies,karen milleneven though seismologists have launched warnings and that the work of strengthening against earthquakes and tsunamis will be completed in three years.

This is karen millen the first case of a real recovery in Japan since the reactor accident in Fukushima caused by the earthquake and tidal waves that ravaged the coast of north-east 11 March, 2011. The set of 50 nuclear reactors in the archipelago were maintained at a standstill because of earthquakes or for regular maintenance sessions, and only units 3 and 4 of Ohio have so far been allowed to restart after passed technical examinations and political obstacles.

The re-operation of the reactor 3 Ohi, pending in four days, karen millen outlet ended nearly two months of total absence of nuclear power in Japan, a situation that many people would have wanted indefinitely.

A petition that collected for the time more than 7.5 million signatures, the last two Fridays, tens of thousands of Japanese have expressed their opposition to nuclear power plants by gathering outside the residence of Prime Minister in Tokyo. For three days, hundreds of opposition are also ferocious siege to the Central Ohio by blocking access to the site, karen millen dresses supported by other events around the country.

A citizenship test more "patriotic" karen millen
